code:
t = input()
n = int(input())
if t[-1].isnumeric() == False:
	t += '1'
arr = []
num = []
ind = -1
for i in range(len(t)):
	ind += 1
	if t[ind].isnumeric():
		arr.append(t[:ind])
		num.append(int(t[ind]))
		t = t[ind+1:]
		ind = -1
word = ""
for i in range(len(arr)):
	word += num[i] * arr[i]
print(word[n-1])
